effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop, this move will hit with double power.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop, this move will hit with double power.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop, this move will hit with double power.

short_effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Pokémon in the air.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Pokémon in the air.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Pokémon in the air.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the target to inflict damage.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the target to inflict damage.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the target to inflict damage.
